Mar 2022 - Aug 2022

This is my first react.js project. I've mastered react with Mosh Hamadani. It's a simple app that contain several movies connected to a backend. you can add, modify, search or like a movie but only the admin can delete a one, also you can register with an email and password, and this will be stored in the database. I have deployed my application using Heroku to a mongodb. and that is the beginning...
